_header: Jesu the son of Mary mild
Subjects: Passion, meditations on; Christ, Passion of
_description: A meditation on the Passion — twenty stanzas rhyme royal

BLHar4012.First Lines:
Ihesu the sonne of mare myldeThe secunde parsone in
                    Trinyte…
BLHar4012.Last Lines:
…With thy angellis and sentis allWhos number is
                    innumerall
BLHar4012.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             “An Unpublished Passion Poem in British Library MS. Harley 4012.” 
             Notes and Queries
         n.s. 24 [222] (1977): 485-8: 485-7.
